string.text: Discipline is the ability to refine your skill in certain skills which require practice or focus.
Faith is your deeply held belief on your chosen religion or a deep trust on your spiritual convictions.
Represents your knowledge in the ancient rites and supernatural phenomena, including the use of organic and inorganic materials in incantations. It defines your capacity to to access magic.
Alchemy represents your understanding in manipulating matter and mixing base substances into higher or more purified forms.
